tagline: Sustainable mental wellness practices, not productivity-disguised-as-self-care
pros: Draws from multiple frameworks (CBT, ACT, mindfulness) without dogma
Excellent at values clarification and life transition support
Gentle but honest — will name uncomfortable patterns
Clear about coaching vs. therapy boundaries
cons: Will not substitute for professional therapy
Reflective pace may feel slow for action-oriented people
Won't optimize emotions for productivity — that's not what this is

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
